title: Hi im a Nami main and is it really comming a new nami skin?

embed.description: Statistics, abilities, information, skins, store details and more for Nami, the Tidecaller, a League of Legends champion.

body:
I saw on lolskill.net that a skin called "deep sea Nami" was available but i couldn't it in the store. Am I just stupid and can't find the skin or is the skin really comming?

                         {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}      {{champion:267}}

replies.body: She's not out this patch - you should be seeing her flopping around next patch, though! :)
I am also a Nami main and while I already own Koi and the chromas I will purchase rp and spend it on this new skin with no regrets

It would be wise to go to Surrender@20 for PBE news and check Skin Spotlights on YouTube next time instead of making a thread ;)

Surrender @ 20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/

Skin Spotlights: https://www.youtube.com/user/SkinSpotlights
could be cooler i dont like it much

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0b3HxLkoFyQ

O its coming alright. Just next patch. Just hit PBE
